<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shielding Salve](/Equipment.aspx?ID=724)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=121" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 259 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This shimmering paste has many properties of a [_shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) spell. When you slather it onto a creature or object, the target gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC for 1 round. The first time a physical attack or a [_magic missile_](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) hits the target during that round, the oil prevents 5 damage from that attack or spell, and then the oil's effect ends.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Shielding Salve
